sentences.sContent: But this is only at an early stage of feasibility study.
sentences.sContent_eng: But this is only at an early stage of feasibility study.
sentences.sCn: 但是这仅仅处于可行性研究的初期阶段。

sentences.sContent: We then know if the idea is worth taking on to the next stage which is the feasibility study.
sentences.sContent_eng: We then know if the idea is worth taking on to the next stage which is the feasibility study.
sentences.sCn: 这样我们就会知道这个想法是否值得进行到下一步，也就是可行性研究。

sentences.sContent: If you are planning any major changes in your business this year, you should also do a feasibility study.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are planning any major changes in your business this year, you should also do a feasibility study.
sentences.sCn: 如果计划在今年对你的事业做出任何重大的改变，你也应该做一些可行性研究。

phrases.pCn: 可行性研究报告；可行性报告

words.tran: 可行的；可能的；可实行的
